mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements
List advertisements view shows the list of advertisements
Admin clicks on the edit button on an advertisement
Redirects to the edit advertisement page
Edit advertisement view displays the advertisement content
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks save
Edit advertisement view sends data to AdsController
AdsController saves the data to AdsModel
AdsController sends the result to edit advertisement view
Edit advertisement view displays the edited advertisement
